entities.name: chocolate
entities.description: Chocolate is mentioned as being in the library. It is not clear what kind of chocolate it is or why it's there, but it seems to be a surprise for someone.

entities.name: library
entities.description: The library is where the chocolate is found and where the scene with Hermione chasing Harry and Ginny takes place. It's also mentioned as having tables in Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who finds the chocolate in the library and chases Harry and Ginny out. She's also mentioned as being involved in career advice meetings.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is chased by Hermione from the library along with Ginny. He's also mentioned as having a meeting with Professor McGonagall to discuss his future career.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is chased by Hermione from the library along with Harry. She's also mentioned as being involved in career advice meetings.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the one who will be meeting with Harry to discuss his future career. She's also the Head of Gryffindor House.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is mentioned as having tables where pamphlets and notices are placed. It's also the location of Professor McGonagall's office.

entities.name: pamphlets
entities.description: Pamphlets are mentioned as being placed on tables in Gryffindor Tower. They're related to various Wizarding careers.

entities.name: leaflets
entities.description: Leaflets are mentioned as being placed on tables in Gryffindor Tower. They're related to various Wizarding careers.

entities.name: notices
entities.description: Notices are mentioned as being placed on tables in Gryffindor Tower and on the board. They're related to career advice meetings.

relationships.description: Hermione is in the library when she finds the chocolate and chases Harry and Ginny out.
Harry has a meeting with Professor McGonagall to discuss his future career. The time of the meeting is listed below.
Hermione chases Harry and Ginny out of the library with her wand.
